backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining types, state maps, authorization mixins, storage, and helpers for orders, designs, users, and karigar records.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to the new format and initializes karigar storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, and cache version management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and authentication bootstrap logic, handling identity, user profile, admin checks, loading states, and error screens. Renders appropriate dashboards or access/blocked/setup screens based on user state.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Displays a dialog showing total quantity breakdown with computed totals and styled item list. Uses cards and color-coded values.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with an icon and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Shows a blocked user notice with details and a logout option that clears identity and queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Displays bootstrap errors during profile loading with error details, retry, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling II auth, including retry logic and visual states.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Shows a screen for authenticated users without a profile, displaying their principal ID and instructions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial admin profile setup that collects a name and triggers profile-related cache invalidation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards children based on allowed roles, showing loaders or access denied when applicable.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design‑image mappings with design info, an image badge, and formatted creation dates.
Dialog that fetches and displays a design image with loading, error, and no‑image states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with details and options to reload or clear session.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing technical error details with copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert with optional retry and expandable technical error details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown UI for exporting orders as CSV or Karigar-specific PDF/JPEG files with filtering and status handling.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Export bar for a single karigar allowing daily or total PDF/JPEG export of their orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Control panel to filter orders by date or design code and export them as PDF or JPEG.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog form for creating a new karigar using a mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Displays a dialog showing detailed order info for a karigar, including metadata and a design image viewer.
Defines the main application layout with role‑based navigation, mobile menu handling, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Provides a dialog form to create or edit master design mappings, including selecting a karigar and saving via mutation.
Handles importing master designs from a file, parsing entries, previewing results, and saving them in bulk.
Renders a table of master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Shows a preview of ingested orders with unmapped code highlighting and formatted order details.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Displays a warning banner when skipped or invalid orders are detected and offers a clear‑cache action.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Renders a filter bar for orders with search, karigar, status, date, and type toggles, computing unique values from sanitized orders. Calls onFiltersChange when filters update and supports clearing all filters.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Displays a table of sanitized orders with optional selection mode, highlighting, and RB edit/view actions. Handles row selection logic and shows a fallback when no orders exist.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial supplied quantities for multiple RB orders with validation. Manages quantity state, errors, and returns valid quantities on confirm.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog to edit the total supplied quantity of a single RB order with validation. Submits updates via a mutation hook and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Shows backend reachability status with refresh, canister ID display, and expandable error details. Uses reachability and clipboard hooks to provide online/offline indicators.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending offline sync queue information. Allows manual sync when online and pending uploads exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs a health check on the backend and reports reachability status and health data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with simple success/error status and button labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile using a safe actor, handling auth and bootstrap-related errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Computes the user's effective app role by combining profile data with backend admin detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend data, persists updates, and manages cache cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, designs, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout and safe initialization logic, handling errors and retries cautiously.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom admin tab styles.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates and triggers a printable HTML/PDF export for karigar orders with iOS handling and summary data.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by export type and generates a downloadable CSV with sorted and formatted fields.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, resolving generic and karigar names and tracking unmapped entries.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an orders list into fixed-size batches.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics including totals and per‑karigar statistics.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Normalizes karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' for blank values.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Formats optional numeric fields with fixed decimals or returns empty strings.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Creates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using its first three letters.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order’s timestamp from uploadDate or createdAt, converted from nanoseconds.
Checks whether an order type string represents a customer order.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts sanitized orders by normalized design code and order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sorts sanitized orders by formatted karigar name, design code, and order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates PersistentOrder objects and filters invalid entries while logging skips.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Extracts embedded images from XLSX files using JSZip, returning basic positional metadata.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses an Excel sheet into rows linking serial numbers and design codes to embedded images, validating required columns and extracting image bytes per row.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Reads master design data from the first worksheet, normalizes header names, matches required/optional columns, and outputs design code–entry pairs.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel sheet with flexible column matching, validates required fields, handles optional numeric fields, and returns orders with warnings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS dynamically if needed, reads an Excel file into a workbook, and validates that at least one sheet exists.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master design parsing based on file type, using PDF text extraction or Excel parsing with unified error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Selects PDF or Excel order parsing, processes the file, and returns parsed orders with warnings and friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Dynamically loads PDF.js and extracts per-page text grouped into lines using positional data for downstream table parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Extracts master design entries from flattened PDF text by locating a header row and parsing subsequent lines into design code, generic name, and karigar name.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row format first and falling back to section-header mode, generating PersistentOrder objects with timestamps.
Parses a single PDF table-row line into a PersistentOrder when formats match expected tokens including generic name, numeric fields, and karigar name.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Provides IndexedDB-based caching for orders, master designs, metadata, and ingestion queue operations.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Implements an offline sync hook that uploads queued ingestion batches and updates sync state while managing retries and query invalidation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard managing orders, filters, tabs, exports, dialogs, and cache interactions for various order views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Handles uploading, parsing, and saving design image mappings from an Excel file with validation and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and manages master design mappings with search, add, import, and edit functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides UI for creating users, managing approvals, and blocking or unblocking user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows active orders for a karigar with filtering, metrics, cache handling, and bulk delivery actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page with branding, background image, and an II LoginButton.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Initializes the first admin by storing a bootstrap token and refreshing actor state.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Parses order spreadsheets, applies master design mapping, previews results, and uploads orders in batches with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Dashboard page fetching orders and activity logs, managing filters and tabs, and rendering tables and dialogs for staff workflows.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes grouped and filterable, with a dialog to create master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, listens for updates, and logs activation events with periodic update checks.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic types and extracts safe error details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user-friendly error messages by decoding, classifying, and formatting backend and network errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn't resolve within the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state JSON describing feature requirements and pending requests for managing Karigar assignments in the Master Design admin portal.
